name: BikeChan Demo
description:
BikeChan is a visual novel with a small biking mini game to keep things interesting. Kozue Hongo is a young professional just trying to make it in the world. She has been riding her bike for years throughout her small town and has gain the nick name BikeChan! Kozue was recently hired by the high school she graduated from to be the new swimming team coach. One day on her way to work she accidentally runs into a young man and they happen to switch bikes as she is leaving. This was the moment that change her life. Did it change it for the better or for the worse?! You will have to play to find out!

8 Bit Retro Funk (By David Renda)
